content.rendered:
Your stories of your experience with The Oven Cleaning Company are so important to us. We love to hear about how we were able to assist you in helping keep your home beautiful. Not only does your feedback bring a smile to our faces, but it is also instrumental in improving and growing The Oven Cleaning Co.

To be able to read other peoples experiences of The Oven Cleaning Company or leave your story go to the following links

Facebook

The Oven Cleaning Company Melbourne
See all reviewsWrite a review
‹
›

Google

The Oven Cleaning Company Melbourne
4.8
Based on 186 reviews
See all reviewsWrite a review
Pleasure to deal with and now the 14 year old oven looks like I've just bought it from the shop.
Jason Bellinger
04:25 19 Aug 24
Thanks to the tech/cleaner Gerald- he did the best job ever on my oven. He explained everything and also fixed an issue I had. Left my oven in the best condition I have seen it for years. Sparkling clean and excellent working order. I will use this company again for sure.
Amanda Cox
01:24 05 May 24
Excellent service! Thorough clean that is environmentally friendly. Easy communication with the team. My oven looks like new again. Highly recommended!!
Leanne Clayton
05:56 03 Apr 24
Gerald cleaned our oven today . It looks fantastic.He did a wonderful job.I have used this company many times and they are so professional ,I wouldn't use anyone else
Robyn Carson
03:06 02 Apr 24
Charles Knight
06:08 11 Oct 23
Hired for Oven cleaning. Excellent job and great value. Arrived on time and very friendly. Would recommend to anyone!
AnimalGirl 260505
07:40 17 Aug 23
Fantastic job performed by Gerald, professional and meticulous clean of Miele oven , could not be happier with outcome. Thankyou
cramfs
01:02 02 Aug 23
Great service, I will never clean my oven again
Janine Bolton
07:55 16 Jul 23
First time using this company, they were polite professional prompt and he did an outstanding oven! My oven was sooooo gross I honestly thought it was beyond help, but now it looks brand new!! I can’t believe it! The gentleman who came was so nice and polite too! Definitely use again!
Miriam Smith
05:33 13 Jul 23
First time booking a professional cleaning for our 9 y.o oven and rangehood. After much consideration we went with this company because of the good reviews on google. The process from booking until the delivery of the job was great. The office was helpful with my questions and they also made sure to book me for the last job of the day since we live in a city apartment and the hot tank in their van needs to properly heat up through the day because there's no access to power points in our basement parking lot.Garry arrived slightly earlier than scheduled but he contacted me first to make sure that I'm home. He's friendly and did a fantastic job.Can't believe that our oven can look so clean like brand new.The service was really worth your money and time. Definitely recommended.
Mariska Lalamentik
22:37 02 Jun 23
An amazing service, well worth the wait. I had my oven and BBQ cleaned today and you'd now think they were brand new. Communication with the company is easy, staff are delightful and arrive on time. A briliant job. Would definitely use again.
F S
04:52 31 May 23
Thanks Gerald for the amazing job cleaning my oven and grill today. I can't stop admiring your work. It was money well worth spending. It will be so much easier to maintain and I will definitely have it professionally cleaned again and will be recommending your company to everyone. Thanks again.
Pam Pozingis
05:56 13 Apr 23
Jonathon Barnett
07:38 24 Mar 23
We had The Oven Cleaning Company do a deep clean of our six year old oven and Rhys did an amazing job, it looks like it’s brand new.Would recommend to anyone.
Lee Gamble
20:32 28 Feb 23
Jason Vincent Nani
03:09 16 Dec 22
Garry, from The Oven Cleaning Company, arrived on time and did a wonderful job cleaning my oven - it looks like new. He was friendly, professional and very efficient. When I called to arrange the service the lady on the phone was very helpful. I would definitely recommend The Oven Cleaning Company Melbourne, and we will be using them again.
Graeme Davis
02:58 09 Dec 22
Cleaned my oven and it looks as good as new. Efficient booking service and reminder notification, also notification that the cleaner was on his way. Took about the time that was suggested. Very happy to recommend this company.
Janet Franklin
07:13 18 Nov 22
Value for money, friendly and great communication from first contact to delivery of service. I was happy with cost and results. Discovered why my oven doesn’t work so well, it’s broken, and told me what to do about it. Friendly service and value for money. I’m happy.
annette siegersma
02:32 18 Nov 22
Great job I use them every year.
Veronica Scott
11:00 13 Nov 22
Real life magic. First class customer service, amazing results. Highly recommend
claire stronge
02:34 11 Nov 22
Restores my faith in Humanity! Thanks very much Gerald. He can do with my ovens what I can't. I love to cook and I respect and value my gear, I have to cook with. There is nothing like experience and from my interaction today Gerald has that, big time. You really get what you pay for. Very over the moon!
Rob Weaver
03:17 09 Nov 22
This is the 3rd time I have used The Oven Cleaning Company. Absolutely brilliant service. Punctual, technicians are friendly and are willing to help out in any way. The price is great and my oven looks like brand new. Would recommend them in a heart beat!!
Angie Apap
09:30 06 Nov 22
Amazing does not begin to describe the results of our oven clean. You would swear it had just been installed new. The proof is in the before and after shots!
Linda Hoskins
05:28 28 Oct 22
The Oven Cleaning Company did a great job, thoroughly cleaning the very well used 20+ years old oven. Whilst I had to wait quite a while to get an appointment, their very professional, pleasant, polite serviceman arrived on time. He worked quietly with minimal disruption to the family who were working from home, resulting in a perfectly clean, gleaming oven. It is a well spent money as we're very happy with the result. Now booking for cooktop clean. Thank you.
Manjit Gill
01:50 28 Oct 22
Rhys cleaned my oven this afternoon. Did a fantastic job, it's like new. Highly recommended. Thanks, John.
Riddley Walker
06:10 27 Oct 22
James
09:51 25 Oct 22
The OCC did a deep clean of my oven and stove. It looks brand new. Great job. Thank you.
Benjamin Rowe
20:49 21 Oct 22
The Oven Cleaning Company did a great job yesterday thoroughly cleaning the very well used 8 year old? Smeg 900 cm stove that was insitu when we bought this house last year. It took quite a while to get an appointment, but their very pleasant, polite serviceman Gary arrived right on time on the appointed day. He worked quietly making no mess at all for 4 hours, resulting in a perfectly clean, gleaming oven and cooktop. It is a significant amount of money but well spent as we're very happy with the result. Thank you.
Gwenneth Woods
04:19 21 Oct 22
Thankyou Rhys. Great job, looks like the oven,cooktop and range hood are brand new.
Keren Walton
02:01 21 Oct 22
The result was amazing and the staff and experience was 5 star.
Max Peggie
01:46 21 Oct 22
My oven is gleaming-Gerald came and worked his magic. I got my double oven, all racks, cook top and rangehood cleaned. Money well spent and I’d recommend to anyone.
Deborah Hogg
01:31 21 Oct 22
Have used this company for years. They’re absolutely brilliant. On time, reliable and do the most wonderful job
Sue Mona
01:05 19 Oct 22
Highly recommend. The guy was on his hands and knees for hours scrubbing. Looks brand new.
Ceri S
13:25 15 Oct 22
I used The Oven Cleaning Company Melbourne to clean a very dirty oven in an investment property, prior to sale. They did an excellent job, it sparkled from top to bottom and looked like a new oven. I will definitely use them in the future for my personal oven cleaning.They are reasonably priced and reliable.
Deborah James
04:18 10 Oct 22
I cannot speak highly enough of this company. Sally was always so very quick to respond to any queries I had. Rhys did an absolutely first rate clean on the oven and he was a delight to deal with. Will absolutely be using this company again and will be spreading the word about how totally exceptional they are!
Lee Campbell
04:30 07 Oct 22
Tony was very polite, was efficient and provided a good quality outcome with good attention to detail
Andrew Henderson
05:04 30 Sep 22
This is my second time engaging the services to clean my range-hood, oven and also cooktop burners and as like before my appliances were spotless. Their team has been courteous and very helpful throughout the process. Quick response and attention to detail was something I really appreciate.
Jody T
03:19 18 Sep 22
I’ve used the Oven Cleaning Co for several years. Always great service and friendly staff. Incredible cleaning job, it’s like having a brand new oven!
Stephanie Rampton
03:29 16 Sep 22
wonderful people to deal with on time and you can actually talk to them
Lesley Crawford
03:45 13 Sep 22
We had 2 ovens cleaned and I was thrilled with the outcome!
Brooke Whitbread
02:58 09 Sep 22
Outstanding service provided by the Oven Cleaning Co. From clear communication to punctual, polite, high-quality result. Will definitely use again.
Alistair Bishop
09:41 05 Sep 22
The team has been helping us for years and it’s a great service. Always friendly, on time and the oven is sparkling clean every time.
Marcus Sands
22:31 02 Sep 22
Blown away! We had an oven and stove top clean and the results are absolutely amazing - it honestly looks like a brand new oven. Book it in you won’t regret it!
Laura Nyles
09:38 02 Sep 22
I am so happy The Oven Cleaning Company was recommended to me. They have taken the stress out of cleaning my oven, which would usually take me half a day using harsh chemicals, and I never managed to get close to the results TOCC provide. They are very professional and friendly and are definitely worth the money. Thanks!
Stefania Cotrone
04:08 31 Aug 22
Massive thank you to Reece who cleaned our 900mm oven recently! He did an amazing job with the oven now looking brand new. He went above & beyond by replacing globes for us so we can see what we’re cooking! 😂🤦🏻‍♀️. Great service, would highly recommend. Annette K
Annette Kakris
08:17 28 Aug 22
I have used The Oven Cleaning Company twice now and have an ongoing annual booking with them.They are incredibly efficient, hardly know they're in the house.When they're done my oven looks like new inside and and out. It's an exceptional service and result.
Martina Costanzo
07:53 19 Aug 22
‹
›

Word of Mouth – review site
